languages.text: {n}Маражай цыкает зубом.{/n} "Жаль, очень жаль... меня изрядно развлекала наша маленькая игра. Что ж, оставайся в своем унылом ограниченном мирке — я найду себе занятие поинтереснее тебя".

{n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "Such a pity... I was finding our little game quite amusing. Very well. Stay and languish in your dull and limited world — I will find something more interesting than you to occupy myself with."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай цыкает зубом.{/n} "Жаль, очень жаль... меня изрядно развлекала наша маленькая игра. Что ж, оставайся в своем унылом ограниченном мирке — я найду себе занятие поинтереснее тебя".

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは舌打ちした。{/n}「残念だな。俺たちのちょっとした遊びが気に入ってたのに。まあいい。お前はここに居て、くだらねえ狭い世界に悩み苦しんでるがいいさ。俺はお前よりも面白い何かを探すことにするぜ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "Such a pity... I was finding our little game quite amusing. Very well. Stay and languish in your dull and limited world — I will find something more interesting than you to occupy myself with."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは舌打ちした。{/n}「残念だな。俺たちのちょっとした遊びが気に入ってたのに。まあいい。お前はここに居て、くだらねえ狭い世界に悩み苦しんでるがいいさ。俺はお前よりも面白い何かを探すことにするぜ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋啧了啧舌。{/n}“真是遗憾……我还以为我们之间的小游戏很有趣呢。好吧，你就在你那狭小、无聊的世界中受尽煎熬吧，我会找些更有趣的事情来做。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "Such a pity... I was finding our little game quite amusing. Very well. Stay and languish in your dull and limited world — I will find something more interesting than you to occupy myself with."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋啧了啧舌。{/n}“真是遗憾……我还以为我们之间的小游戏很有趣呢。好吧，你就在你那狭小、无聊的世界中受尽煎熬吧，我会找些更有趣的事情来做。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai fait claquer sa langue.{/n} « Quel dommage... Notre petit jeu n'était pas pour me déplaire, mais si tel est votre désir, continuez donc de vous languir dans votre petit monde terne et étriqué. Je trouverai bien quelque chose de plus intéressant que vous pour me divertir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "Such a pity... I was finding our little game quite amusing. Very well. Stay and languish in your dull and limited world — I will find something more interesting than you to occupy myself with."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai fait claquer sa langue.{/n} « Quel dommage... Notre petit jeu n'était pas pour me déplaire, mais si tel est votre désir, continuez donc de vous languir dans votre petit monde terne et étriqué. Je trouverai bien quelque chose de plus intéressant que vous pour me divertir. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai chasquea la lengua.{/n} «Una lástima... estaba disfrutando con nuestros jueguecitos. De acuerdo. Quédate y languidece en un mundo mustio y limitado... yo ya encontraré algo más interesante con lo que entretenerme».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "Such a pity... I was finding our little game quite amusing. Very well. Stay and languish in your dull and limited world — I will find something more interesting than you to occupy myself with."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai chasquea la lengua.{/n} «Una lástima... estaba disfrutando con nuestros jueguecitos. De acuerdo. Quédate y languidece en un mundo mustio y limitado... yo ya encontraré algo más interesante con lo que entretenerme».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai schnalzt mit der Zunge.{/n} "Ein Jammer ... Ich fand unser kleines Spiel sehr amüsant. Also schön. Bleibt in Eurer langweiligen und beschränkten Welt – ich werde etwas Interessanteres als Euch finden, mit dem ich mich beschäftigen kann."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "Such a pity... I was finding our little game quite amusing. Very well. Stay and languish in your dull and limited world — I will find something more interesting than you to occupy myself with."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai schnalzt mit der Zunge.{/n} "Ein Jammer ... Ich fand unser kleines Spiel sehr amüsant. Also schön. Bleibt in Eurer langweiligen und beschränkten Welt – ich werde etwas Interessanteres als Euch finden, mit dem ich mich beschäftigen kann."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai dilini şıklatıyor.{/n} "Ne kadar yazık... Küçük oyunumuzu oldukça keyifli buluyordum. Pekâlâ... Sıkıcı ve sınırlı dünyanda kal ve çürü o hâlde. Kendimi meşgul edecek, senden daha ilginç bir şeyler bulurum ben."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue.{/n} "Such a pity... I was finding our little game quite amusing. Very well. Stay and languish in your dull and limited world — I will find something more interesting than you to occupy myself with."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, dilini şıklatıyor.{/n} "Ne kadar yazık... Küçük oyunumuzu oldukça keyifli buluyordum. Pekâlâ... Sıkıcı ve sınırlı dünyada kal ve çürü o hâlde. Kendimi meşgul edecek senden daha ilginç bir şeyler bulurum ben."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
